title: Bug 11306 - New class wizard launches simple project wizard
description: Since there are no existing projects, the dialog prompts the user to create a new project. This is very handy.
OB: When the user launches the new class wizard and answers 'yes' to creating a new project, instead of opening the Java Project wizard, the dialog displays the first page of the generic new project wizard. The Java Class wizard should open the Java Project wizard.
EB: The new class wizard should correctly open the Java Project wizard when the user chooses to create a new project.
SR: Ensure that the new class wizard correctly opens the Java Project wizard when the user selects to create a new project.
